content:
Hi Rancepete

Unfortunately Thunderbird for Android doesn't have a print function at this time.

It is a feature that's been requested by the community. Please consider up-voting the idea on Mozilla connect. The Thunderbird team take these into consideration when planning their road-maps and priorities.

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/ability-to-print-email-messages/idi-p/71885

For now, a possible workaround is to take a screen capture of the email. You could then open this in another app which supports printing. Alternatively open the email in your account providers web portal and print from there. I think Android browsers support printing via the "share" feature.
creator: platform34
